Meinungsumfrage zur Oberbürgermeisterwah: Opinion poll for the mayoral election on September 23, 2018 in Zweibrücken
Am 23. September wählt Zweibrücken einen: On September 23, Zweibrücken will elect a new mayor. RHEINPFALZ conducted an opinion poll to gauge support for the candidates. An important result: Just before the election, more than a third of the people in Zweibrücken still do not know whether and whom they will vote for. Therefore, the race remains open, even though the gaps are large before the final sprint.
Artikel aus der Rheinpfalz zur Oberbürge: Article from Rheinpfalz on the mayoral election in Zweibrücken:
Stimmungsbild zur Oberbürgermeisterwahl: Mood picture for the mayoral election 2018 in Speyer
Wenn heute Oberbürgermeisterwahl wäre, g: If the mayoral election were today, there would be a neck-and-neck race between incumbent Hansjörg Eger (CDU) and deputy Stefanie Seiler (SPD). This mood picture was determined by a representative opinion poll commissioned by RHEINPFALZ. Article from Rheinpfalz on the mayoral election in Speyer:
Repräsentative Meinungsumfrage zu Ehrung: Representative opinion poll on honoring former Chancellor in Speyer – Helmut-Kohl-Ufer
Das Stadtratsvotum vom 15.März, die Rhei: The city council vote of March 15 to rename the Rhine promenade to "Helmut-Kohl-Ufer" is in line with the will of the citizens. This is the result of a representative survey of 500 people in Speyer commissioned by RHEINPFALZ.
